00039 public class MACSeed {

00041     private int seedOfMAC;

00043     public MACSeed() {
00044     }

00046     public int getSeedOfMAC() {
00047 
00048         String OS = System.getProperty("os.name");
00049         try {
00050             if (OS.startsWith("Windows")) {
00051                 String mac = GetMACWin();
00052                 seedOfMAC = (int) GenarateRandSeed(mac);
00053             } else if (OS.startsWith("Linux")) {
00054                 System.out.println("L");
00055             } else {
00056                 System.out.println("Sistema operativo desconocido: " + OS);
00057             }
00058         } catch (Exception e) {
00059             e.printStackTrace();
00060 
00061         }
00062         return seedOfMAC;
00063 
00064 
00065     }
00066 
00067     private String GetMACWin() {
00068         String mac = "";
00069         try {
00070             Process p = Runtime.getRuntime().exec("getmac");
00071             InputStream IS = new BufferedInputStream(p.getInputStream());
00072             Scanner scan = new Scanner(IS);
00073             while (scan.hasNext()) {
00074                 if (scan.nextLine().startsWith("=")) {
00075                     mac = scan.nextLine().substring(0, 17);
00076                 }
00077             }
00078 
00079         } catch (Exception e) {
00080         }
00081 
00082         return mac;
00083     }
00084 
00085 
00086     private final static String GetMACLin() {
00087         String outputText=null;
00088         try {
00089               Process p = Runtime.getRuntime().exec("ifconfig");
00090         InputStream stdoutStream = new BufferedInputStream(p.getInputStream());
00091 
00092         StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
00093         for (;;) {
00094             int c = stdoutStream.read();
00095             if (c == -1) {
00096                 break;
00097             }
00098             buffer.append((char) c);
00099         }
00100          outputText = buffer.toString();
00101 
00102         stdoutStream.close();
00103 
00104 
00105         } catch (Exception e) {
00106             e.printStackTrace();
00107         }
00108        return outputText;
00109     }
00110 
00111     private double GenarateRandSeed(String mac) {
00112         StringTokenizer token = new StringTokenizer(mac, "-");
00113         // Pass the two   StringTokenizer to firts numbers of MAC because are the builder code
00114         token.nextToken();
00115         token.nextToken();
00116         String Smac1 = token.nextToken();
00117         double Dmac1 = onlyNumbers(Smac1);
00118         String Smac2 = token.nextToken();
00119         double Dmac2 = onlyNumbers(Smac2);
00120         Random rand = new Random();
00121         double seed = rand.nextInt(1000) * Dmac1 / Dmac2;
00122         return seed;
00123     }
00124 
00125     private double onlyNumbers(String mac) {
00126 
00127         String newMac = "";
00128         if ((mac.charAt(0) < '0') || (mac.charAt(0) > '9')) {
00129             newMac = newMac + "1";
00130         } else {
00131             newMac = newMac + mac.charAt(0);
00132         }
00133         if ((mac.charAt(1) < '0') || (mac.charAt(1) > '9')) {
00134             newMac = newMac + "1";
00135         } else {
00136             newMac = newMac + mac.charAt(1);
00137         }
00138         double d = Double.parseDouble(newMac);
00139         return d;
00140     }
00141 }
